title: Spring Gospel Meeting
description:
April 29 – May 2

Speaker: Emmett Clark

Theme: Understanding Grace

**Lesson Times / Topics**

* Sunday   9am - Marvelous Infinite Grace
* Sunday 10am - Grace: Can’t Be Earned
* Sunday   6pm - The Gospel of the Grace of God
* Monday  7pm - Obstacles to Grace
* Tuesday  7pm - Grace, The Christian and Works of Service
* Wednesday 7pm - Noah Found Grace in the Eyes of God
